bug.author: chenxinfeng4
bug.summary: ERROR in "pose_cfg.yaml > project_path" while using GUI “Train Network”
bug.description:
Describe the bug ERROR in GUI “Train Network”, there is an error in "pose_cfg.yaml" --> the "project_path" is not correct. Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):
OS: Windows10 DeepLabCut Version 2.2b8
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, i.e.:
Go to deeplabcut.launch_dlc(). After finish "Create training dataset", I choosed "Train Network". However it report the error:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17546446/92683113-9e84bd80-f364-11ea-9378-9cb6b4e3390b.png></denchmark-link>
Than I opened the 'dlc-models\iteration-0\crossMazeSep10-trainset80shuffle1\train\pose_cfg.yaml', and saw the context in the pose_cfg.yaml.
The "project_path" is just the error, so I must manually corrected it everytime:
project_path: E:\cxf\crossMaze-FanLab-2020-09-10
TRACEBACK

comments.comment: Good catch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chenxinfeng4>@chenxinfeng4</denchmark-link> ! I have just pushed a fix .
